ai-tha-ap209:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap209:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap209:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap209:4.1_0: who has been given to him by one perception,
ai-tha-ap209:4.2_0: I was the rose-apple tree by the blazing king
ai-tha-ap209:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sāla.
ai-tha-ap209:7.1_0: the seventh Elder Nun Sālavatī was the seventh,
